revision.text: ==Middle English== ===Noun=== {{head|enm|noun}} # A [[gift]] given at the start of the year, or at the start of a term of office. #* '''c. 1385''', {{w|William Langland}}, ''Piers Plowman'', III: #*: That fyre shal falle and berne · al to blo askes / The houses and þe homes · of hem þat desireth / Ȝiftes or '''ȝeresȝyues''' · bi-cause of here offices.
